name: Inside No. 9 (Series 1)
summary:
记得《疯城记》吗？Reece Shearsmith和Steve Pemberton再度携手归来，联合BBC推出这部暗黑喜剧《Inside NO.9》,关于片名，主创在一次采访中提到这完全是随机想到的一个名字，原本也不是9这个数字，后来觉得9更加顺口才采用了。
该剧与《黑镜》的结构类似，一集一个故事，每集的故事都是独立的；看过《疯城记》的人应该都为二位的演技所折服，相信此次的6个新故事也不会令人失望。（简介转自人人影视）

eps.name: Sardines
eps.desc: Rebecca (Katherine Parkinson) and Jeremy (Ben Willbond) hold an engagement party at Rebecca's family's mansion. The guests play the parlour game "Sardines" (a variation of hide-and-seek in which one person hides and the other players have to join them in their hiding place once they are found), but as everyone ends up crammed into a wardrobe together, their old secrets and insecurities start to reveal themselves. Also starring Steve Pemberton, Reece Shearsmith, Anna Chancellor, Tim Key, Anne Reid, Timothy West, Ophelia Lovibond, Marc Wootton, Julian Rhind-Tutt and Luke Pasqualino.

eps.name: A Quiet Night In
eps.desc: Hapless cat burglars Eddie (Steve Pemberton) and Ray (Reece Shearsmith) break in to the luxury house of a wealthy old man (Denis Lawson) and try to steal an expensive painting without getting caught. Also starring Oona Chaplin and Kayvan Novak. The music in the episode is Rachmaninoff's Piano Concerto No. 2 and Harry Nilsson's version of "Without You".

eps.name: Tom & Gerri
eps.desc: Tom (Reece Shearsmith) is a frustrated primary school teacher and aspiring author. One night, a homeless man named Migg (Steve Pemberton) hands in Tom's lost wallet, and to show his gratitude Tom invites him into his flat. However, he soon becomes the victim of his own generosity as Migg gradually takes control of everything in Tom's life. Also starring Gemma Arterton and Conleth Hill.

eps.name: Last Gasp
eps.desc: Jan (Sophie Thompson) and Graham (Steve Pemberton) ask childen's charity WishmakerUK to do something special for their terminally ill daughter's ninth birthday. The charity sends pop star Frankie J Parsons (David Bedella), but the party takes a grim turn when Frankie dies of an intracranial aneurysm while blowing up a balloon. Realising the balloon contains Frankie's potentially valuable dying breath, Graham argues with WishmakerUK's representative Sally (Tamsin Greig) and Frankie's assistant Si (Adam Deacon) over its rightful ownership.

eps.name: The Understudy
eps.desc: Successful West End stage actor Tony Warner (Steve Pemberton) is starring in a production of Shakespeare's Macbeth at the Duke of Cambridge Theatre. His understudy Jim (Reece Shearsmith) has always wanted a starring role, but life begins to imitate art as Jim's driven fiancée Laura (Lyndsey Marshal) urges him to aspire for greater things. Also starring Rosie Cavaliero, Julia Davis and Richard Cordery.

eps.name: The Harrowing
eps.desc: Katie (Aimee-Ffion Edwards) is hired to look after the disabled Andras (Sean Buckley) while his siblings and usual carers Hector (Reece Shearsmith) and Tabitha (Helen McCrory) are out. The siblings live in a cold, gothic mansion, and as the night goes on Katie becomes increasingly terrified of her surroundings and dreads seeing to the mysterious man upstairs.
